name: Lynn ROWELL, dba Beaumont Greenery, et al., petitioners, v. Leslie L. PETTIJOHN, in Her Official Capacity as Commissioner of the Texas Office of Consumer Credit Commissioner.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Lynn ROWELL, dba Beaumont Greenery, et al., petitioners,
v.
Leslie L. PETTIJOHN, in Her Official Capacity as Commissioner of the Texas Office of Consumer Credit Commissioner.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit for further consideration in light of Expressions Hair Design v. Schneiderman, 581 U.S. ----, 137 S.Ct. 1144, 197 L.Ed.2d 442 (2017).
casebody.head_matter:
Lynn ROWELL, dba Beaumont Greenery, et al., petitioners,
v.
Leslie L. PETTIJOHN, in Her Official Capacity as Commissioner of the Texas Office of Consumer Credit Commissioner.
No. 15-1455.
Supreme Court of the United States
April 3, 2017.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit for further consideration in light of Expressions Hair Design v. Schneiderman, 581 U.S. ----, 137 S.Ct. 1144, 197 L.Ed.2d 442 (2017).
